text: Lepetodrilus is a genus of small, deep-sea sea snails, hydrothermal vent limpets, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Lepetodrilidae. A few species have been found in methane and sulfide seeps.Shannon B. Johnson, Curtis R. Young, William J. Jones, Anders Warén and Robert C. Vrijenhoek, Migration, Isolation, and Speciation of Hydrothermal Vent Limpets (Gastropoda; Lepetodrilidae) across the Blanco Transform Fault, Biological Bulletin, Vol. 210, No. 2 (Apr., 2006), pp. 140-157 ==Species== Species within the genus Lepetodrilus include: * Lepetodrilus atlanticus Warén & Bouchet, 2001 * Lepetodrilus corrugatus McLean, 1993 * Lepetodrilus concentricus Linse, Roterman & C.
